Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

open Nat Set

/--
Let $P(x_1,\dots,x_n)$ denote a polynomial with real coefficients in the variables $x_1, \dots, x_n$, and suppose that
\[
\left( \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1^2} + \cdots + \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_n^2}\right) P(x_1, \dots,x_n) = 0 \quad \mbox{(identically)}
\]
and that
\[
x_1^2 + \cdots + x_n^2 \mbox{ divides } P(x_1, \dots, x_n).
\]
Show that $P=0$ identically.
-/
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) := by
  rw [← sub_eq_zero] at hderiv ⊢
  have h := hsumsq
  rw [dvd_iff_exists_eq_mul_left] at h
  rcases h with ⟨q, hq⟩
  simp_all [Finset.sum_sub_distrib, mul_comm]
  <;> induction n with
  | zero =>
    simp_all [Finset.sum_empty]
  | succ n ih =>
    simp_all [Finset.sum_insert, Finset.mem_singleton, MvPolynomial.pderiv_eq_zero]
    <;> aesop
```

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) := by
  rw [← sub_eq_zero] at hderiv ⊢
  have h := hsumsq
  rw [dvd_iff_exists_eq_mul_left] at h
  rcases h with ⟨q, hq⟩
  simp_all [Finset.sum_sub_distrib, mul_comm]
  <;> induction n with
  | zero =>
    simp_all [Finset.sum_empty]
  | succ n ih =>
    simp_all [Finset.sum_insert, Finset.mem_singleton, MvPolynomial.pderiv_eq_zero]
    <;> aesop

```lean4
import Mathlib

open Nat Set

/--
Let $P(x_1,\dots,x_n)$ denote a polynomial with real coefficients in the variables $x_1, \dots, x_n$, and suppose that
\[
\left( \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1^2} + \cdots + \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_n^2}\right) P(x_1, \dots,x_n) = 0 \quad \mbox{(identically)}
\]
and that
\[
x_1^2 + \cdots + x_n^2 \mbox{ divides } P(x_1, \dots, x_n).
\]
Show that $P=0$ identically.
-/
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) := by
  classical
  rw [← C_0] at hderiv hsumsq
  simp_all [MultivariatePolynomial.ext_iff, Finset.sum_eq_zero_iff_of_nonneg,
    Finset.sum_eq_zero_iff_of_nonneg]
  <;> aesop
```

```lean4
import Mathlib

open Nat Set

/--
Let $P(x_1,\dots,x_n)$ denote a polynomial with real coefficients in the variables $x_1, \dots, x_n$, and suppose that
\[
\left( \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1^2} + \cdots + \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_n^2}\right) P(x_1, \dots,x_n) = 0 \quad \mbox{(identically)}
\]
and that
\[
x_1^2 + \cdots + x_n^2 \mbox{ divides } P(x_1, \dots, x_n).
\]
Show that $P=0$ identically.
-/
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) := by
  rw [dvd_iff_exists_eq_mul_left] at hsumsq
  rcases hsumsq with ⟨q, hq⟩
  have h := hderiv
  simp_all [Function.iterate_succ', MvPolynomial.pderiv]
  <;> induction n with
  | zero => contradiction
  | succ n ih =>
    cases n with
    | zero =>
      simp_all [Fin.sum_univ_succ, Fin.sum_univ_zero, pow_two, MvPolynomial.pderiv]
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> simp_all [MvPolynomial.ext_iff, MvPolynomial.coeff_add, MvPolynomial.coeff_mul,
        MvPolynomial.coeff_X, MvPolynomial.coeff_C, Fin.sum_univ_succ, Fin.sum_univ_zero,
        pow_two, MvPolynomial.pderiv]
      <;> aesop
    | succ n =>
      simp_all [Fin.sum_univ_succ, pow_two, MvPolynomial.pderiv]
      <;> ring_nf at *
      <;> simp_all [MvPolynomial.ext_iff, MvPolynomial.coeff_add, MvPolynomial.coeff_mul,
        MvPolynomial.coeff_X, MvPolynomial.coeff_C, Fin.sum_univ_succ, Fin.sum_univ_zero,
        pow_two, MvPolynomial.pderiv]
      <;> aesop
```

  | succ n ih =>
    cases n with
    | zero =>

      <;> simp_all [MvPolynomial.ext_iff, MvPolynomial.coeff_add, MvPolynomial.coeff_mul,

```lean4
import Mathlib

open Nat Set

/--
Let $P(x_1,\dots,x_n)$ denote a polynomial with real coefficients in the variables $x_1, \dots, x_n$, and suppose that
\[
\left( \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1^2} + \cdots + \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_n^2}\right) P(x_1, \dots,x_n) = 0 \quad \mbox{(identically)}
\]
and that
\[
x_1^2 + \cdots + x_n^2 \mbox{ divides } P(x_1, \dots, x_n).
\]
Show that $P=0$ identically.
-/
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) := by
  rw [← sub_eq_zero] at hderiv hsumsq ⊢
  have h := hderiv
  have hsumsq := hsumsq
  simp_all [sub_eq_add_neg, add_comm]
  <;> aesop
```

```lean4
import Mathlib

open Nat Set

/--
Let $P(x_1,\dots,x_n)$ denote a polynomial with real coefficients in the variables $x_1, \dots, x_n$, and suppose that
\[
\left( \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_1^2} + \cdots + \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x_n^2}\right) P(x_1, \dots,x_n) = 0 \quad \mbox{(identically)}
\]
and that
\[
x_1^2 + \cdots + x_n^2 \mbox{ divides } P(x_1, \dots, x_n).
\]
Show that $P=0$ identically.
-/
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) :=
sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2005_b5
(n : ℕ)
(npos : n > 0)
(P : MvPolynomial (Fin n) ℝ)
(hderiv : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.pderiv i)^[2] P = 0)
(hsumsq : ∑ i : Fin n, (MvPolynomial.X i) ^ 2 ∣ P)
: (P = 0) := by
  rw [← sub_eq_zero]
  have h := hsumsq
  obtain ⟨Q, hQ⟩ := h
  rw [hQ] at hderiv ⊢
  simp_all [Finset.sum_sub_distrib, Finset.sum_mul, Finset.mul_sum]
  <;> induction n with
  | zero =>
    simp_all [Finset.sum_empty]
  | succ n ih =>
    simp_all [Finset.sum_range_succ, pow_two]
    <;> aesop
```
